it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.message

Class CoapResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.message.CoapMessage
      • it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.message.CoapResponse

  • public class CoapResponse
extends CoapMessage
    CoAP response message, with method for handling CoAP-specific options.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoapResponse

        public CoapResponse(CoapMessage msg)
        Creates a new CoapResponse.
        Parameters:
        msg - a CoAP message to be copied

      • CoapResponse

        public CoapResponse(CoapMessageType type,
                    CoapResponseCode response_code,
                    int message_id)
        Creates a new CoapResponse.
        Parameters:
        type - message type (Confirmable (0), Non-Confirmable (1), Acknowledgement (2) or Reset (3))
        response_code - response code
        message_id - message ID, used for the detection of message duplication, and to match messages of type Acknowledgement/Reset to messages of type Confirmable/Non-confirmable

        Gets message code as string.
        Overrides:
        getCodeAsString in class CoapMessage
        Returns:
        the response code (code class and code detail separated by a dot) and description (e.g. "2.01 Created")
